name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, v. Charles N. LEE, Appellant

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, v. Charles N. LEE, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
Judgment of sentence affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Richard J. Hodgson, Norristown (Court-appointed), for appellant.
Ronald T. Williamson, David M. McGlaughlin, Asst. Dist. Attys., for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
445 A.2d 100
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, v. Charles N. LEE, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
May 19, 1982.
Richard J. Hodgson, Norristown (Court-appointed), for appellant.
Ronald T. Williamson, David M. McGlaughlin, Asst. Dist. Attys., for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
